info.description: API to retrieve the cash management bundle arrangements and associated details such as bundle balances, bundle hierarchy, status events, etc
info.title: Cash management Bundle arrangement details

get.summary: List of account Exceptional in Bundle Hierarchy
get.description: List of account Exceptional in Bundle Hierarchy

parameters.name: bundleId
parameters.description: Indicates an arrangement reference which acts as a master for the sub arrangements being created

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: bundleId
parameters.description: Indicates an arrangement reference which acts as a master for the sub arrangements being created

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

bundleArrangement.description: The field is to specify an arrangement reference which can act as a Master for the arrangement being created. Eventually, the new arrangement becomes a Sub-Arrangement of the Master.

accountAlias.description: This field forms part of an associated multi-value set to specify the details of an Account during one of Restructure events

accountReference.description: Account Reference of the error account

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

accountCompany.description: Company of the account to be created

accountCountry.description: Country of the account to be created

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

accountLevel.description: Captured for information purpose to render the placeholders in GUI

accountProduct.description: Product of the Account to be created or in the case of an existing standalone Account being added to the Hierarchy, then this is the Product to which that Account will be changed into.

accountSequence.description: The sequence in which this account record is created

alternateReference.description: If the new Account to be created is a shadow of another Account already exisitng in another system, then the Account reference of that system can be specified here. The value given in this field will be mapped to ALTERNATE.ID field in arrangement activity and ensure that this Account doesn't already exist in T24 with another reference (because ALTERNATE.ID would be configured to be unique across T24).

cancelRestructure.description: Indicates a flag to cancel a restructure event

errorMessage.description: Contains the description of the error.

errorSource.description: Error source of the Bundle account

errorType.description: Error types of the Bundle account

keepBalance.description: When an Account is removed from a Hierarchy, it is possible to dictate if it should be removed with or without Balance. Allows YES and Null  Yes - The account will move out of pool with balance while delinking account or during change pool. Null - The account will move out of pool with ZERO balance while delinking/change pool. Amount will be settled to its settlement account.

linkType.description: Denotes associated multi value set to specify Accounts involved in the Pool Restructuring and dictates what should happen to the Account in the corresponding row.

liveDate.description: Denotes the date on which the Account is expected to go live in cash pool structure.

newBundle.description: The new bundle reference is specified in this field when a account moves from the current pool to another pool.

parentAccount.description: Parent account of the account to be added to the Bundle Hierarchy.

shortName.description: Contains the name of the account, basically the short title of the account.

status.description: Contains status of the data rights request.Allowed values are INITIATED, INPROGESS, EXTENDED, COMPLETED, REJECTED.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

arrangementStartDate.description: Indicates the date on which the arrangement was created

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

parentAccount.description: Parent account of the account to be added to the Bundle Hierarchy.

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

companyCode.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

internalCreditFacility.description: To define Secondary Limit Amount to be used for the purpose of Secondary Limit Check.The Secondary Limit Amount defined in this field will be represented in respective account currency

creditCheckTransactionType.description: To define credit checking conditions in conjunction with the field CREDIT.CHK.CONDITION.

isCreditCheckCondition.description: To decide if credit check processing to be performed for the account based on the conditions defined in the field CREDIT.CHK.TXN.TYPE.

ledgerBalance.description: Contains the ledger balance of the account which is the total of all entries posted against the account excluding any entries with the processing date in the future.

clearedBalance.description: Balance taking into consideration all cleared funds booked against the account, including credit and reversed debit entries with a future exposure date.

lockedAmount.description: Shows reserved amount for the underlying account for a given balance reservation event.

availableBalance.description: Available balance of the account which is the projected balance which includes the net movements of both debits and credits against the account.

alias.description: This field forms part of an associated multi-value set to specify the details of an Account during one of Restructure events.

alternateReference.description: If the new Account to be created is a shadow of another Account already exisitng in another system, then the Account reference of that system can be specified here. The value given in this field will be mapped to ALTERNATE.ID field in arrangement activity and ensure that this Account doesn't already exist in T24 with another reference (because ALTERNATE.ID would be configured to be unique across T24).

level.description: Captured for information purpose to render the placeholders in GUI

goLiveDate.description: Denotes the date on which the Account is expected to go live in cash pool structure. Input is prohibited when bundle is in Draft status Input is allowed for NEW.OFFER accounts only for setting live date for link type SET.LIVE.DATE Input is mandatory for any restructure activity on Live accounts. Restructure activity on preliminary accounts will be effective current dated.

linkType.description: Denotes associated multi value set to specify Accounts involved in the Pool Restructuring and dictates what should happen to the Account in the corresponding row.

keepBalance.description: When an Account is removed from a Hierarchy, it is possible to dictate if it should be removed with or without Balance. Allows YES and Null  Yes - The account will move out of pool with balance while delinking account or during change pool. Null - The account will move out of pool with ZERO balance while delinking/change pool. Amount will be settled to its settlement account.

status.description: Contains status of the data rights request.Allowed values are INITIATED, INPROGESS, EXTENDED, COMPLETED, REJECTED.

newMaster.description: The new bundle reference is specified in this field when a account moves from the current pool to another pool. Accepts bundle arrangement reference.Bundle reference must be given with mnemonic in case of other company. Example AA24DGRYHY/CO3. This field is allowed to be input only for link type Change Pool..

poolEvent.description: Denotes the restructure event for the account linked to the Balance Netting pool.

poolEventDate.description: Denotes the restructure date if the account is linked to the balance netting pool.

isMultiCurrency.description: Indicates if the account supports multi-currency functionality.

isExternalPosting.description: To indicates if the account allows entries posted from outside the network of Summary accounts. This should only be set for Summary accounts and Funds Diversion accounts inside a Summary account network.

parentBackValueDate.description: Holds the date of the latest internal restructuring of the network of Parent accounts above this account. i.e. the latest date when the network of Parent accounts above this account was changed.

allowedBackValueDate.description: Holds the latest restructuring date of the network of Parent accounts above this account. It will be set to the date when an account was added to the network of Parent accounts as either a direct or indirect parent of this account.

postingRestrictId.description: Identifies any restrictions for posting entries that are imposed on a Customer

postingRestrictDisplayName.description: Display name of Posting Restriction, if any, applicable for the customer

blockCode.description: Unique code used to block the accounts

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

title.description: Main menu title or header which the user wants to display on the screen when requesting the display of this main menu. This field can be expanded to allow the user to enter the description of the main menu in various languages.

bookedBalance.description: Balances of the account as per the Booking dated.

valueDatedBalance.description: Balances of the account as per the value dated. Contains the value dated Balance of the Account.

companyMnemonic.description: Shortcut code for referring an Entity/Company/Branch related to the image record

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

productDescription.description: Indicates the description of the Product

parentAccount.description: Parent account of the account to be added to the Bundle Hierarchy.

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

status.description: Contains status of the data rights request.Allowed values are INITIATED, INPROGESS, EXTENDED, COMPLETED, REJECTED.

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

bookingBalance.description: Contains the current Booked Balance of the Account.

valueDatedBalance.description: Balances of the account as per the value dated. Contains the value dated Balance of the Account.

availableBalance.description: Available balance of the account which is the projected balance which includes the net movements of both debits and credits against the account.

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

availableBalance.description: Available balance of the account which is the projected balance which includes the net movements of both debits and credits against the account.

ledgerBalance.description: Contains the ledger balance of the account which is the total of all entries posted against the account excluding any entries with the processing date in the future.

clearedBalance.description: Balance taking into consideration all cleared funds booked against the account, including credit and reversed debit entries with a future exposure date.

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

availableBalance.description: Available balance of the account which is the projected balance which includes the net movements of both debits and credits against the account.

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

effectiveDate.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction date. Dates are expected in YYYYMMDD format

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

companyName.description: The company in which payment is processed

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

companyCode.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

status.description: Contains status of the data rights request.Allowed values are INITIATED, INPROGESS, EXTENDED, COMPLETED, REJECTED.

modifiedDate.description: Date on which the Bundle has been modified.

structureName.description: Unique Name of the Balance Netting structure.

recipientCurrency.description: The account used for payment received. Currencies of the recipient.

isBlocked.description: Balance Netting is blocked or Not

blockedDateTime.description: Date on which the account has been blocked.

blockCode.description: Unique code used to block the accounts

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

blockStartDate.description: Start date of the Blocked account

blockEndDate.description: End date of the Blocked account

title.description: Main menu title or header which the user wants to display on the screen when requesting the display of this main menu. This field can be expanded to allow the user to enter the description of the main menu in various languages.

poolEventDate.description: Denotes the restructure date if the account is linked to the balance netting pool.

poolEvent.description: Denotes the restructure event for the account linked to the Balance Netting pool.

goLiveDate.description: Denotes the date on which the Account is expected to go live in cash pool structure. Input is prohibited when bundle is in Draft status Input is allowed for NEW.OFFER accounts only for setting live date for link type SET.LIVE.DATE Input is mandatory for any restructure activity on Live accounts. Restructure activity on preliminary accounts will be effective current dated.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

ledgerBalance.description: Contains the ledger balance of the account which is the total of all entries posted against the account excluding any entries with the processing date in the future.

clearedBalance.description: Balance taking into consideration all cleared funds booked against the account, including credit and reversed debit entries with a future exposure date.

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

debitLockedAmount.description: Indicates the reserved amount for a given arrangement account and balance reservation event. It's a debit type of transaction

creditLockedAmount.description: Indicates the reserved amount for a given arrangement account and balance reservation event. It's a credit type of transaction

availableLimit.description: The portion of an allocated credit limit that is available for the nominated customer

product.description: Indicates an id or name of a product

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

customer.description: Contains the customer identifier to fetch list of consent arrangements for the customer or customer identifier of the debtor account. This will be populated once the SCA(Strong Customer Authentication) is completed.

parentAccount.description: Parent account of the account to be added to the Bundle Hierarchy.

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

preferredCurrency.description: Currency on which the Master account and SA/CS/TR account balances to be converted.

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

ledgerBalance.description: Contains the ledger balance of the account which is the total of all entries posted against the account excluding any entries with the processing date in the future.

clearedBalance.description: Balance taking into consideration all cleared funds booked against the account, including credit and reversed debit entries with a future exposure date.

lockedAmount.description: Shows reserved amount for the underlying account for a given balance reservation event.

availableBalance.description: Available balance of the account which is the projected balance which includes the net movements of both debits and credits against the account.
